name: obsidian-sample-plugin
description: This is a sample plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.copy: powershell -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path tests\vault\previous-river-test\.obsidian\plugins\previous-river | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Path build\main.js, manifest.json -Destination tests\vault\previous-river-test\.obsidian\plugins\previous-river -Force"
scripts.copy-to-notes: powershell -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $env:USERPROFILE\Doc\notes\.obsidian\plugins\previous-river | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Path build\main.js, manifest.json -Destination $env:USERPROFILE\Doc\notes\.obsidian\plugins\previous-river\ -Force"
